item.description: The Agawam Cultural Council is concluding its Spring Foreign Film Festival with the acclaimed Italian film Bread and Tulips. It's described as a sweet-natured comedy that offers escapist entertainment. What's not to like about that? The cost includes complimentary hors doeuvres and a drawing before the movie. Click here for a review http://www.rottentoma... or just come along and be pleasantly surprised.
item.how_to_find_us: Well, you might want to give this a test drive or call the cinema if Agawam's not your stomping grounds. I found the directions provided by the link confusing. It's on Rte. 75 in the Southgate Plaza. I'll be in line or in the lobby looking for you.
item.why: You'll love it because - don't we all love a good movie once in awhile?
item.name: Foreign Film Festival
